author: johnh
msg: For AccelHandler/HtmlAccelServlet, return the same HTTP status code as that of the fetched resource. Emit the same error text as well in this case.

This is done w/ one caveat, to convert HTTP 500 to HTTP 502, done on a configurable basis (default=true). This is done to prevent common monitoring software from seeing Accel itself as faulty (status 500), vs. the server it's proxying.

author: woonsan
msg: Adding a name in pmc member list
